feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

entry.title: [RBX3][Dedicated servers] - 45D24
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 3, 22:00 UTC  -  Apr 6, 04:00 UTC

Mar 18, 01:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/04/2022 22:00 UTC
End time : 06/04/2022 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be unreachable during operations (30 minutes per server).
Service improvement : Following the failure of an altigo (power supply and server reboot equipment) for which we have no spare, we have to relocate the servers to a compatible rack.

entry.title: [RBX4][Dedicated servers] - 50C19
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 27, 22:00 UTC  -  Mar 30, 04:00 UTC

Mar 18, 01:15 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 27/03/2022 22:00 UTC
End time : 30/03/2022 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be unreachable during operations (30 minutes per server).
Service improvement : Following the failure of an altigo (power supply and server reboot equipment) for which we have no spare, we have to relocate the servers to a compatible rack.

entry.title: [BHS1/GRA2/RBX1/ERI1][Dedicated servers] - Upgrade RTvRack
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 22, 08:00 - 23:59 UTC

Mar 16, 08:06 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/03/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 22/03/2022 23:59 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In regard to our lifecycle management, we need to upgrade all RTvRack exchanger to a new version in order to have a homogeneous park.

entry.title: [GRA2/BHS1/ERI1][RtvRack] - Upgrade xDC/xBU
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 21, 08:00 - 23:59 UTC

Mar 16, 05:43 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 21/03/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 21/03/2022 23:59 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In regards to our lifecycle management ,we need to upgrade our exchangers RTvRack in order to have a homogeneous park

entry.content:

Mar 17, 21:20 UTC
Completed - Maintenance will not be carried out. It will be rescheduled at a later date.

Mar 17, 21:00 UTC

entry.title: [BHS7][Dedicated Servers] - B716A04
entry.content:
Mar 16, 15:00 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 16/03/2022 11:39 UTC
End Time : 16/03/2022 14:00 UTC
Service impact : All the servers in the B716A04 rack are now reachable

Mar 16, 14:05 UTC
Update - Update: As previously mentioned, about an issue with the B716A04 rack cooling system we are facing. We currently have 73% of the equipment coming back up. We will keep you posted on the progress.

Mar 16, 11:56 UTC
Update - Update :You can follow the evolution of the unavailable equipment on the following link: http://vms.status-ovhcloud.com/index_bhs7.html

Mar 16, 11:53 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 16/03/2022 11:39 UTC
Service impact : We are currently experiencing a problem with the cooling system of the B716A04 rack. Some equipment may not respond
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently investigating to get the equipment in the rack back in service.
